snippet.title: TowerFall is coming to Nintendo Switch on September 27th!
snippet.description:
TowerFall, the classic local multiplayer archery brawler, is coming to Nintendo Switch on September 27th! Murder your friends with archery trickshots, catch arrows out of the air to fire them back, and loot treasure chests for game-changing power-ups. TowerFall's magical blend of chaos, tight controls, close calls, and last-second upsets make it the life of the party.

Dark World and Ascension expansions are included, including a 4-player co-op campaign. New for the Switch release is the 6-player battle mode, complete with a whole new set of alternate widescreen stages! There's also new variants to play with, and Madeline from Celeste has joined the fight, along with her dark alter ego.
